Html:
We have made 3 Packages for all sort of Adobe Flash Player update. This Packages is only approved for the group WPP. For alle other groups the configuration is set to "not approved".
But after some time the configuration change from "not approved" to "approved" for all the other groups.

I cant find a reason for this change....

The problem is still there, and i cant find a reason while the package changing the state without any user action. Just now i changed the state again from "approved" to "not approved", but this time f√ºr all groups.

If anyone have a hint for me for this behavior just let me know.
Never i've that a approval changed in WSUS/WPP. Wahts about your colleague? Did you approved in WPP or in WSUS.MSC?
